header.title: Maid journalistihkka sáhttá servvodatmedias oahppat? | Sámi allaskuvla

body.p: Journalistihka Masteris lea boahtte vahkus guosselogaldalli, Prof Nico Carpentier, gii doallá rabas logaldallama eaŋgalsgillii.

p.span: "What has journalism to learn from community media? About participatory assemblages, institutional embeddedness and production ethics"

body.p: Nico Carpentier is Professor at the Department of Informatics and Media of Uppsala University. Associate Professor at the Communication Studies Department of the Vrije Universiteit Brussel (VUB), Docent at Charles University in Prague. and Research Fellow at Loughborough University and Cyprus University of Technology.

p.em: Eanet dieđuid logaldalli birra gávdnabehtet dás:
